channel.title: Constant automining lag?
channel.description:
I've gotten a few autominers to work.
I put in the colors.
It clicks on the rock.
And insane lag begins. It is HORRIFIC lag in every single autominer I have used, except for one that goes to the bank. (Hartless Cow's [SS]EastVarrockMinerBanker) And even that one goes to the bank and just stands in it, and doesn't deposit anything.
Does anyone have an antidote?
I've been at this for hours. :P
Thanks.

item.title: Constant automining lag?
item.dc:creator: @oliver1205 oliver1205
item.description:
@oliver1205 wrote:

Freddy1990:

Could possibly be that your computer is too slow to handle for example random checking and such…

i think its his scripts, or hes trying to use scarscape with the offical rs client lol. go to villu-reborn.com resigter, and get some nice free scripts

Read full topic
